name: Secret Six Samurai - Hatsume
text: You can banish 2 "Six Samurai" monsters from your GY and/or face-up from your field, then target 1 "Six Samurai" monster in your GY, except "Shadow Six Samurai - Hatsume"; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Shadow Six Samurai - Hatsume" once per turn. If exactly 1 "Six Samurai" monster you control (and no other cards) would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.
